sense.name: find, learn, or realize something
sense.examples: They discovered traces of lead in the paint. The doctor discovered the patient's tell-tale signs of a cocaine addiction. Mary is good at discovering which seats have the best acoustics in a theater. They may never discover who committed that murder. The Japanese discovered that there is a risk. Is there a good test to discover if you have Lyme disease? Who really discovered America?

sense.name: disclose, expose
sense.examples: He refused to discover the location of the stolen art.
